myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage

Class UserStatitics

  • java.lang.Object
    • myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage.UserStatitics

  • public class UserStatitics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores statistics for each user

    The data stored are :

    • Number of user's rides
    • The total time the user spent on a bike
    • The total amount of charges
    • The total time-credit earned by the user
    Author:
    Edouard Benauw
